answers.answer: You should probably see your doctor and get tested for both thyroid issues (start with TSH, Free T3 and Free T4) and diabetes (get fasting blood sugar tested, as well as a Hemoglobin A1c test.Many find that if they stop eating foods prepared with refined flour (white bread, pastries, pasta, etc) and refined sugar, they do much better.  Switch to whole grain breads and pasta, brown rice, etc.  For sweetener you can try Stevia or agave nectar - both natural and won't spike your blood sugar.See your doctor asap and get tested so you will know for sure what you are dealing with.
